article:

The puppy  _   to dig   a hole in the ground.
"Grandpa, I'm going to  _  him Digger. He likes to dig," Maggie smiled
"That's  _ . But make sure that he doesn't dig my flowers up," Grandpa said and went back to the house.
That night Maggie fell asleep with  _   lying next to her. What a wonderful surprise to get a little dog!
